page.title: 15Cockerham Leisure Activities
page.content: Cockerham is a very active rural area, so attracts town and city dwellers to relax and enjoy their free time. There are numerous amenities to offer. The most popular for this area are two caravan sites at Bank End, which is situated on the side of the River Cocker estuary. There are l20 caravans, which are seasonal - March to November. The estuary offers many sporting activities. These include water-skiing, speedboating, windsurfing,yachting, canoeing and fishing. The Morecambe Bay Wild Fowlers own all the shooting rights on the marsh land. Being a rural area bird watchers are a regular sight around the estuary,as well as on the surrounding farm land. The habits of Badgers are studied closely in various woods in Cockerham.
